sentences.sContent: He told us, in a very roundabout way, that he was thinking of leaving.
sentences.sCn: 他拐弯抹角地对我们说他想走了。

sentences.sContent: He left today on a roundabout route for Jordan and is also due soon in Egypt.
sentences.sCn: 他今天绕道前往约旦，也将很快到达埃及。

synos.tran: 迂回的，绕道的；圆滚滚的

phrases.pCn: 以一种转弯抹角的方式

trans.tranOther: not done or said using the shortest, simplest or most direct way possible
